alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued May 01 at 10:01AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A HIGH SURF ADVISORY remains in effect... WHAT...High surfs of 11 to 13 feet WHERE...All shores of American Samoa WHEN...Through Wednesday IMPACTS...Minor. Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 1001 TAEAO ASO GAFUA ME 1 2023 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... MAFUAAGA...Galu maualuluga e 11 i le 13 futu NOFOAGA...Talafatai o motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Lulu AAFIAGA...Feololo. E maualuga le fafati o galu fa`apea le malolosi o aave o le sami, e le saogalemu mo ni gaioiga i le sami. E ono tutupu fo`i lologa ma sologa i itu-matafaga. O galu tetele ma le maualuluga e ono aafia ai gutu o uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O tagata uma o lo`o i matafaga fa`apea le `au fai faiva, ia usita`ia fautuaga mo lou saogalemu.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
